title: Robots in bot games(roit plz come in)
body:
I have just go to Canada from China.And when I am playing bot games in American service,i find a very serious problem:robots
this is my match history:
http://matchhistory.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/#match-details/NA1/2247443440/234260506?tab=overview
I found there are 2kinds of robots.
I can find these robots in nearly every bot games.
First kind of robots are like {{champion:24}} and {{champion:9}}  in the game.They always equip only{{item:1001}} first
when they go to lane, they start assisting the enemy.
The second kind of robots are like {{champion:22}} in the game.They always equip only{{item:1055}} first,and go to the lane .
And they don't equip other equipment until they have gold to buy a whole legendary equipment.
I hope riot can deal with this kind of robots.

replies.body: I appreciate you keeping an eye out for suspicious behavior in-game!  Please use the reporting tool after the game to help us review these cases.  Be sure to use the field text to provide any additional information and details in your report.  Thanks for helping us maintain fair and positive play!

thx for reply.
I have already did it
I will report as soon as I find other robots
